description: Florence Fabricant brought this recipe to The Times in 1988, part of a piece looking at the Coyote Cafe in Santa Fe, N.M, where the owner Mark Miller drew from a diverse selection of ingredients Here, duck serves as the filling in tamales smothered in mole sauce It’s a rich, satisfying dish for a weekend project.
title: Duck Tamales With Mole Sauce
title_page: Duck Tamales With Mole Sauce Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Florence Fabricant brought this recipe to The Times in 1988, part of a piece looking at the Coyote Cafe in Santa Fe, N.M, where the owner Mark Miller drew from a diverse selection of ingredients. Here, duck serves as the filling in tamales smothered in mole sauce. It’s a rich, satisfying dish for a weekend project.
Featured in: Coyote's Spirit Frolics Through A Lively Menu In Santa Fe.
